sql.content: select procinst.procinst_id id, procinst.procdef_id, procinst.title, user_.real_name start_user, procinst.start_time, procinst.state, procinst.suspend_time, procinst.end_time, procdef_extend.image from ( select procdef_id, procinst_id, title, start_user_id, start_time, null end_time, suspend_time, state from bpm_ru_procinst union select procdef_id, procinst_id, title, start_user_id, start_time, end_time, suspend_time, state from bpm_hi_procinst ) procinst left join bpm_re_procdef_extend procdef_extend on (procdef_extend.procdef_id = procinst.procdef_id) left join smt_imp_user user_ on (user_.id = start_user_id) where procinst.procinst_id= #{procinstId}

select * from ( select taskinst_id id, procinst_id, key_, source_key, start_time, expiry_time, suspend_time, null end_time, is_all_claimed from bpm_ru_task union select taskinst_id id, procinst_id, key_, source_key, start_time, expiry_time, suspend_time, end_time, is_all_claimed from bpm_hi_task ) task where task.procinst_id= #{procinstId} order by task.start_time desc

select * from ( select taskinst_id id, procinst_id, key_, source_key, start_time, expiry_time, suspend_time, null end_time, is_all_claimed from bpm_ru_task union select taskinst_id id, procinst_id, key_, source_key, start_time, expiry_time, suspend_time, end_time, is_all_claimed from bpm_hi_task ) task where task.procinst_id= #{[0]} and task.key_= #{[1]} order by task.start_time desc
